Title: Manorama Six Feet Under
Writer: Devika Bhagat (story and screenplay), Navdeep Singh (story and screenplay), Manoj Tapadia (dialogue), Abhinav Kashyap (dialogue)
Actors: Abhay Deol, Gul Panag, Raima Sen, Sarika
Plot: Rajasthan-based Satyaveer Singh Randhawa works as a Junior Engineer with Lahkot Municipality's Public Works Department and lives a middle-class lifestyle with his wife, Nimmi, and son, Raju...
